en.answer:
Only one Spell Counter is placed on Skilled Blue Magician. (It is placed as a result of Demise of the Land's own activation.)

If a Spell Card is activated by another effect, Skilled Blue Magician's『each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell resolves』effect will not be applied, and no Spell Counters are placed as a result of that activation.

~~~

This also applies to the following effects. If a Spell Card is activated by these effects, no Spell Counter is placed on Skilled Blue Magician:
● Performapal Sky Magician's ②nd effect
● Necroworld Banshee's ②nd effect
● Ignis Heat, the True Dracowarrior
● Triamid Dancer
● Triamid Hunter's ②nd effect
● Triamid Master's ②nd effect
● Numeron Wall's ①st effect
● Ursarctic Polari's ①st effect
● Dream Mirror of Terror
● Dream Mirror of Joy
● Pop-Up
● Springans Booty's ②nd effect
● Malefic Territory's ①st effect
● Last Resort
● Generaider Boss Fight
● Vampire Takeover
● Metaverse
● Ghostrick Renovation's ①st effect
● Sea Stealth II's ①st effect
● Necrovalley Temple's ②nd effect
en.question: If Demise of the Land is activated, how many Spell Counters are placed on Skilled Blue Magician?
en.title: If Demise of the Land is activated, how many Spell Counters are placed on Skilled Blue Magician?

ja.question: 「<<7620>>」が発動した場合、「<<11552>>」の『①：このカードがモンスターゾーンに存在する限り、自分または相手が魔法カードを発動する度に、このカードに魔力カウンターを１つ置く（最大３つまで）』効果によって魔力カウンターはいくつ置かれますか？
ja.title: 「<<7620>>」が発動した場合、「<<11552>>」に魔力カウンターはいくつ置かれますか？
